topic.title: Configuring LDAP on the server
topic.shortdesc: Couchbase Server works with the OpenLDAP software, which can be downloaded from the openldap.org website.

body.p: The Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) is a public standard that facilitates distributed directories (such as network user privilege information) over the Internet Protocol (IP).
Couchbase connects to LDAP through the saslauthd library. Refer to the next section on how to configure the saslauthd library for LDAP.
